cab.content: i^ioS Military Secret, 719 From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 31st March 1918. (Received at India Office, 5.30 p.m.) 4060. Marri situation. Practically all Khetran headmen have submittedthrough their Chief. Dera Ghazi Khan force now moving to Yitakri.Duki force now moving via Bor to Kimal and Mamand. On 26th Marrisattacked railway near Babarkach, removing rails. Goods train was derailedand seven men killed and two wounded. Small column being sent againstraiders from Babarkach.
